Call Catherine's father. Call Wynn. When you hang up with me, call him.
translation.ja: 私の元夫 ウィンに電話して―

translation.en: Tell him to go to Catherine's school. Tell him to go get her.
translation.ja: 娘を迎えに行くよう伝えて

translation.en: Tell him not to send anybody. Tell him he's gotta go himself, in person.
translation.ja: 絶対に本人が行くようにと 私が帰るまで 娘を保護するように

translation.en: And tell him I need him to keep her, just until I get back.
translation.ja: 私が帰るまで 娘を保護するように

translation.en: Done. Ellie... Dick is dead.
translation.ja: 分かったわ ディックが死んだ

translation.en: I know.
[Alma] They moved him the night after you left. The hospital wouldn't let me see him.
translation.ja: あなたが出発した夜に 病院に搬送された

translation.en: And then I wasn't sure if I should reach you or if reaching you would expose you, but...
translation.ja: あなたの身を案じて 連絡しなかったの

translation.en: I'm sorry, Elena. But listen.
translation.ja: 本当に残念よ でも聞いて

translation.en: My sources are telling me that there is a French intelligence operative down there
translation.ja: 情報源によると フランスのスパイがいる

translation.en: investigating the same thing that we are.
Okay? I don't have a name yet,
but they could get you a special visa and get you out of there.
translation.ja: でも彼らに頼んだら 帰国できるかも

translation.en: [sighs] These people are starting to move faster.
translation.ja: 彼らの動きは加速してる

translation.en: The InterCon assassination attempt... -I was there. -[Alma] I know.
translation.ja: ホテルでの暗殺未遂を 現場で見た

translation.en: I know. Look, we're all over it down here. But you should be safe for now.
translation.ja: 知ってる でもあなたの身は安全よ

translation.en: They're beefing up the military presence.
No, the military was already there in full force before the attempt.
translation.ja: 軍は事件の前からいた

translation.en: They knew it was coming.
And I was meant to be there. Two birds, one stone. The file closes.
translation.ja: 私も消せば 一石二鳥で事件解決

translation.en: [Alma] What?
The date on my bogus passport's the same day Dick died.
translation.ja: 偽パスポートの発行日に 父が…

translation.en: [Alma] Okay, calm down.
Listen. Just stay where you are for now.
translation.ja: 今は動かない方がいい

translation.en: "Gunrunner bleeds out in terrorist attack."
translation.ja: “銃密輸業者　 テロにより死亡”

translation.en: You showed up instead.
[Alma] Hello?Elena?
Elena? Hello?
Elena!
Elena!
Elena!
There are two things I need you to know right away.
translation.ja: 伝えたいことが２つある

translation.en: The first thing I need you to know is that you get to go back to Malibu.
translation.ja: １つ目は あなたがマリブに 帰れるってこと

translation.en: Your dad's coming to pick you up.
Do not go with anyone except your dad. Do you understand?
translation.ja: パパとしか行っちゃダメよ

translation.en: The second thing I need you to know...
is that I love you.
Sometimes... [inhales] we argue and... about things, but I...
translation.ja: 時々 けんかするけど…

translation.en: I think you know...
I only argue because I want your life to be happy and good.
translation.ja: あなたの幸せを 願ってるからなのよ

translation.en: [cries] Want you not to waste your time. Not to waste your talent.
translation.ja: 時間や才能を 無駄にしてほしくない

translation.en: Not to let who you are get mixed up with anyone else's idea of who you should be.
translation.ja: あなたに自分自身を 見失ってほしくない

translation.en: I know you're nodding.
I love you the most. You're my Kit-Cat.
[sighs] Okay.
Everything's set. A car will take you.
translation.ja: 準備完了だ 車を用意した

translation.en: His name is Paul. He's expecting you.
translation.ja: ポールが君を待ってる

translation.en: No one will look for you there. Now, I've been working with the consulate.
translation.ja: 誰も追ってこない 領事館と話した 数日内に帰国できる

translation.en: We're gonna extract you in the next few days.
translation.ja: 領事館と話した 数日内に帰国できる

translation.en: If anything happens, don't come to me. It's too dangerous for you here.
translation.ja: ここには来るな　危険すぎる

translation.en: I'll come to you. Okay?
Can I help you?
Hi.
Uh, I'm Elise.
translation.ja: エリーズ･メイヤーです

translation.en: Elise Meyer.
translation.ja: エリーズ･メイヤーです 〝サーフライダー ホテル〞 〝サーフライダー ホテル〞

translation.en: Highly recommended Elise Meyer of Miami?
translation.ja: マイアミで大評判の？ 〝サーフライダー ホテル〞 マイアミで大評判の？

translation.en: Get up here. Let's get you started already.
translation.ja: 上がってくれ さっさと始めよう

translation.en: Who wants to be sitting around a bunch of jarheaded machos downtown
translation.ja: 軍人どもと過ごす人生など 真っ平だ

translation.en: when you can live right on the edge of paradise?
translation.ja: こんな天国に住めるってのに

translation.en: So, this job is not complicated at all.
Each day, 10:00 a.m. sharp,
routinely,
pick us up fruit from the vendor at Heritage Market.
translation.ja: ヘリテージ市場で 果物を買ってくれ

translation.en: I can get it from closer.
No, Heritage Market. Thank you.
translation.ja: いや　ヘリテージで

translation.en: Guavas from the stall near the entrance.
translation.ja: 入り口近くの店のグアバ

translation.en: Uh, pick us up newspapers from the little woman two streets over.
translation.ja: 通りを２本隔てた店で 新聞を全紙

translation.en: And get all the newspapers. I like to be well-read.
translation.ja: 通りを２本隔てた店で 新聞を全紙 全て読みたい

translation.en: Plus, when guests come, we want to be prepared.
translation.ja: 客のもてなしも大事だ

translation.en: And, uh, let me see.
We have a cook, Evelina,
translation.ja: 料理人もいる エヴェリーナ

translation.en: who comes every day at five and handles supper, so you don't need to worry about that.
translation.ja: 毎日 ５時に来て夕食を作る

translation.en: But just, you know... tidy things.
translation.ja: だから君は ただ家の整頓を

translation.en: I could wipe the chairs.
They said you were sharp.
Do you know this?
Gary Geld, composer. Peter Udell and Ossie Davis did the book.
translation.ja: 作曲はゲルド 作詞はウデルとデイヴィス

translation.en: It's delicious.
Melba Moore version was my favorite. Melba Moore was criminally underrated.
translation.ja: でも一番はメルバ･ムーア 彼女は過小評価されてる

translation.en: Pas de critics.
So anyway, all that should take you through 2:00 p.m. every day.
translation.ja: 用事は午後の２時には 終わるはずだ

translation.en: And no shortcuts. Pas de shortcuts.
After that, your day is your own.
translation.ja: そのあとは君の自由だ

translation.en: Isn't this lovely?
What could be lovelier?
translation.ja: こんないい暮らしはない

translation.en: Take the day.
Get settled in.
Oh, and, uh... be kind to the generator.
translation.ja: 節電に努めるよう頼む

translation.en: We need lights, but not every day.
I only do the petrol run once a week and I want to keep it that way.
translation.ja: 燃料の補給は週一と決めてる

translation.en: [Paul] Elise, happy hour!
Coming!
[Paul] Happy, happy hour.
[Paul] It was complicated. I could tell you stories.
translation.ja: 逸話はいくらでもある

translation.en: -[Elena chuckles] No. -I'm not gonna say any names, but...
translation.ja: あえて名前は伏せるが

translation.en: if I did tell you the names, -you'd recognize every single one of them. -[laughs]
translation.ja: 誰でも知ってるような名前だ

translation.en: And then, there was Haiti,
which I adored.
I was mostly single there, of course.
Just a man about town.
I ran the first, and...
for all I care to know, the only
translation.ja: ポルトープランスで唯一の

translation.en: first-rate gay bathhouse in all of Port-au-Prince.
translation.ja: 高級ゲイ浴場を 経営してたんだ

translation.en: And again, no names,
but my patrons were some of the most major operators on Wall Street,
translation.ja: 私の後援者は皆 ウォールストリートの大物や

translation.en: the hottest of the hot, motion picture,
and agents and executives. I mean, the biggest.
translation.ja: とにかく皆ビッグな 連中だった

translation.en: Of all the places, you know?
I feel like that...
could have been the place.
But then I got scared away when dead chickens started showing up on my gate.
translation.ja: だが門の前に 鶏の死体が置かれ始めた

translation.en: I mean, I may not be the smartest Nellie on the block, but, hey, when I see a dead chicken,
translation.ja: 私もそこまで鋭くないが 鶏の死体だ

translation.en: I know what it means.
I know how to take a hint.
Pas de poulet. Pas de voodoo.
translation.ja: ブードゥーの呪いだよ

translation.en: Pas de Port-au-Prince,
translation.ja: だからハイチを去った

translation.en: so I ended up here.
Bob set me up.
We did a great business. Every room was filled every single weekend.
translation.ja: 商売は大繁盛だった 週末はいつも満室だった

translation.en: And for a while, we ran a beautiful trade with the European set.
translation.ja: ヨーロッパとの貿易も 至極順調だった

translation.en: But then, a few neighbor-island coups and bombings later,
translation.ja: だが隣国の クーデターや爆撃で

translation.en: it trickled down to the backpackers, and then...

translation.en: several State Department warnings later, and we were down to this.
translation.ja: 国務省から警告を受け 今は見ての通り

translation.en: So, why did you stay?
Why are you still here?
I could ask you the same question.
But me, I...
I guess I stayed because I have a very,
very high tolerance for pleasure.
translation.ja: 飽きることがないからかな

translation.en: Tell Evelina to set the table for three tonight. My friend is coming.

translation.en: Who's that?
My friend. The one I told you about?

translation.en: Bob?
No.
The other friend.
Be a dear, fetch me a refill.

translation.en: [Paul] I mean, it's not like the vacancy sign isn't burning a hole in my electric bill or anything.

translation.en: Like I keep telling you, there's people I know who can help you.
translation.ja: 言っただろ 彼らなら助けてくれる

translation.en: People we've met here in the past.
translation.ja: 以前ここに来た連中だ

translation.en: I say, sure, take a room.
translation.ja: 部屋は好きに使っていい

translation.en: Fill it with whatever on earth you want.
Rum punch?
Be a dear, leave it on the side, Elena.
Move it in, move it out, who cares?

translation.en: Just cut me in.
Drop me a bit of this Colombian jet fuel from weekend to weekend and I'll be sweet.
translation.ja: 毎週末にコロンビア産が 手に入れば満足だ

translation.en: We've done this before. [stammering] I told you...
[Paul] Elise!

translation.en: [yells] Elise!
Oh, fuck it.
Evelina!
Wipe the chairs, Elise.
[Treat] If anything happens, don't come to me. It's not safe for you here anymore. I'll come to you.
translation.ja: ここには来るな 俺が会いに行く

translation.en: [Weir] Does she know something?
-Did you tell her something? -[Paul] Of course I didn't tell her.

translation.en: Don't do it the hard way.
You could ride the cattle right through the fence.
...driving the cattle through the goddamn fence.

translation.en: You just missed my partner. You know him, Epperson.
translation.ja: さっきまで 相棒の エッパーソンがいた

translation.en: -[Elena] I don't know him. -[Dick] Yeah, you do. You remember.

translation.en: Hey, Maxie.
-Make with the grill and lay on some chow. -Hey, Ellie.
translation.ja: バーベキューを頼む エレナ

translation.en: The sparks won't burn you because...

translation.en: they're cold.
[Alma] Epperson. Like he doesn't exist.
translation.ja: エッパーソンは 実在しない

translation.en: -A guy named Bob Weir did come up. -[fireworks exploding]
translation.ja: 男の名前は ボブ･ウェア

translation.en: Bob set me up.
[Alma] When he does show up,
it's usually the end of something, not the beginning.

translation.en: [Paul] Elise?
Is that you?
She'll be back up later.
He's there.
Bob Weir.
Oh, fuck. Come in.
[Elena] Out beyond the ocean.
All salt-heavy and thick with fish.
translation.ja: 塩と魚で埋め尽くされてる

translation.en: What do think's out there?
[Treat] Suppose there's nothing out there, actually.
No there.
Plane will be there at eight o'clock tomorrow.
An unmarked will take you to the airstrip. It's ours. You'll be safe.

translation.en: I'm gonna stay a few days till everything levels out, clear some smoke.
translation.ja: 俺は残って様子を見る

translation.en: Says the secret agent man as he walks into the fire.
translation.ja: スパイが 危険に飛び込むのね

translation.en: Easy Rider of the geopolitic, too cool for the press pool.
translation.ja: まさに地政学の 「イージー･ライダー」

translation.en: Stop. True reporter.
Pure spin.
Pick you up at the cove by the Surfrider at 6:00.
Make sure you have your notes and the film. Otherwise it's all fucked anyway.

translation.en: Unless you think they already found them and it's too late.
No, I stashed them.
Good.
[Elena] I'll try to be home before school starts.
translation.ja: 学校が始まる頃には戻る

translation.en: [Cat] Home where?
[Elena] Home wherever you are, Cat.
I'll call you tomorrow before I get on the plane.
translation.ja: 出発する前に電話する

translation.en: Tomorrow when?
[Elena] Probably three o'clock your time. I'll be there.
[Cat] Promise?
[Elena] Okay.
I promise.
[Cat] I'll be waiting.
[automated voice] ...to make a call, please hang up and try again.
translation.ja: 一度 切って おかけ直しください

translation.en: If you need help, hang up, and then dial your operator.
translation.ja: ヘルプが必要な場合は オペレーターへ

translation.en: [Elena] Some real things have happened lately.
translation.ja: 重大事が相次いでいた

translation.en: [Elena] First, I wanted to know who.
Who chose money over life?
translation.ja: 誰が命よりカネを選んだ？

translation.en: Steel and lead over blood and spirit?
translation.ja: 血と魂より 鉄と鉛を？

translation.en: Who the war pig?
Who the profiteer?
Who the cold heart, the vapid soul?
translation.ja: 冷たい心と死んだ魂の 持ち主は？

translation.en: [Treat] Elena!
[Elena] And second...
Second, I wanted to know why.
[Treat] Tomorrow.
[Elena] Tomorrow what?
Tomorrow we leave.
[Treat] The suspect then wheeled on me,
pulling a firearm...
wounding me in the shoulder.
I returned fire...
in course, killing her.
I think... [sighs]
I think she knew she was caught.
You know...
you think you have it covered,
translation.ja: 順調だと思ってた 順調だと思ってた 〝新聞記者が麻薬密輸〞

translation.en: and find out you don't have it covered worth a goddamn.
translation.ja: だが見事に 失敗してしまった

translation.en: It added all up, but...
it won't bring her back.
[Jones speaking French] Elise Meyer.
Elena Janklow. Elena McMahon.

translation.en: Alleged assassin.
Reporter.
American.
Mother. Daughter.
Sandinista sympathizer.
[speaking French] Unfortunately, our initial attempt at interception...

translation.en: [in English] This way, please.
[in French] ...was unsuccessful.
[Jones speaking French] Some would say she was waiting for a payday.

translation.en: Some would say she was caught in the glare.
translation.ja: 〈または 不意を突かれたのだと〉

translation.en: I think Elena McMahon got caught in the glare.
The water was over her head.
I think she realized what she had been set up to do
only in however many seconds there were between the time she registered Morrison on the bluff...

translation.en: and when he pulled the trigger.
[man] Why'd she do it?
I don't have an answer for that kind of tragedy.
The truth is, it's just a hell of a bad outcome.
The last outcome you would ever have wanted.
translation.ja: 最もあるまじき結末だ

translation.en: [Elena] Some real things have happened lately.
translation.ja: 重大事が相次いでいた

translation.en: But we were moving fast.
translation.ja: でも私たちは性急だった

translation.en: We were traveling light.
We were younger.
I was younger.
"All part of...
history's rough draft," we used to say.
History's footnote.
And yet...
Still...
♪ Paladin, Paladin, far, far from home ♪
translation.ja: 原作 「マクマホン･ファイル」 ジョーン･ディディオン著
